summary: The diff shows modifications to backend/main.mo and project_state.json. The project_state.json records REQ-5 as 'pending' and the backend/main.mo appears to be the Version 37 code being restored/deployed. However, there is no evidence in the diff of actual deployment steps (e.g., dfx deploy commands, CI/CD configuration, canister ID updates, or deployment scripts) that would confirm Version 37 was actually built and deployed to the Internet Computer network.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the previously saved Version 37 of the project to the network. Version 37 is built and deployed to the Internet Computer network; the deployed canister reflects the state of Version 37.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows source code changes (backend/main.mo) and a project state file update. There is no evidence of deployment artifacts, dfx.json updates, canister deployment scripts, or any confirmation that the canister was actually deployed to the Internet Computer network. The project_state.json still marks AR-5 (REQ-5) as 'pending'.
